review: Absolutely LOVE my Fire Stick. Its everything all in one and if Im looking for a show it will search Netflix, Hulu, Amazon, etc. Not just one outlet.
author: Jess

review: I've got a Chromecast too, and since I got my Fire Stick I haven't even used the Chromecast. It's nice and easy to use, and videos load much faster than on Chromecast. I might even upgrade to the box if I ever get a better TV. I'd highly recommend this.
author: Mark

review: Awesome little device!  Took hardly any time to install on my HD-ready TV and I can now watch Amazon Prime or Netflix any time I want. Not sure I understand the whole "credits" thing for installing apps like Netflix and Hulu, but haven't had to deal with that yet (have had this a month). I want to mention that I found a great little perk by accident:  when you go a certain amount of time with no activity (pausing something or just on home screen), a "screensaver" program starts up of absolutely gorgeous scenic pictures. BEAUTIFUL! I know that's not why I bought this but I totally love it - sometimes I just want to see the pictures rather than watch TV!  Thank you Amazon - what a lovely side benefit!!
author: Amazon Customer "A user, not an expert"

review: Works great for the price!!Wireless HD can stutter occasionally, but that's the natureof any wireless. My phone gets 35 Down/5 up standing next tothis so it may be the stick. But I paid $24. I didn't expect it tobe perfect.
